jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Full Stack Developer to join a small web consultancy team at Spookfish Innovations, a start-up tech company based out of London and Bangalore. The company has experienced exceptional growth over the past year and are looking to expand this side of the business.

The developer will be expected to work on both front-end and back-end web functionality, delivering high quality applications for a diverse range of clients in India and the UK.

Developer key attributes:

- Ability to deliver innovative technology in line with business requirements in an agile working environment
- Excellent creative talent and attention to detail
- Ability to own a project and work independently
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills
- Ability to deliver tasks and/or projects within given deadlines and to a high quality
- Keen Interest in new ideas and technologies
- Ability to prioritise tasks under pressure
- Ability to work as part of a motivated and driven team

Technical requirements essential for the position:

- Commercial experience using PHP, CSS, LESS / SASS, Javascript / Jquery
- Proven experience developing high quality, responsive websites
- Strong experience of MySQL or other relational database
- Experience using source control
- Proficient/Fluent English speaker

Technical requirements desirable for the position:

- Experience in WordPress Theme & Plug-in development
- Experience in Node.js and Electron
- Experience in ASP.NET (MVC)
- Experience using Microsoft SQL Server
- Experience using distributed source control (E.g. Git, Mercurial, etc.)
- Experience using a code management workflow (E.g. Git-flow)

jobs.title: C# Full Time Developer
jobs.description:
C# Developer to join a startup tech company based out of London and Bangalore. The company has experienced exceptional growth over the past year and are looking to expand the team and to contribute towards our products.

Spookfish develops innovative computer vision technology to solve specific problems across a range of sectors including sport, pharmaceuticals, consumer electronics and the automotive industry. The developer will be expected to build and maintain intuitive and highly responsive front-end interfaces for these real time vision systems.

A key part of the the position will be the ability to gather clear requirements from the both the internal team in Bangalore and directly from the clients across both India and the UK. The candidate should then be able to write full system specifications and and build accurately to these designs.

Developer key attributes:

- Ability to deliver innovative technology in line with business requirements in an agile working environment
- Ability to own a project and work independently
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills
- Ability to deliver tasks and/or projects within given deadlines and to a high quality
- Keen interest in new ideas and technologies
- Ability to prioritise tasks under pressure
- Ability to work as part of a motivated and driven team

Technical requirements essential for the position:

- Commercial experience using C# WPF
- Proven experience developing high quality, responsive user interfaces
- Strong experience in relational database design using SQL
- Experience using SQL Server or other DBMS
- Experience using source control
- Proficient/Fluent English speaker

Technical requirements desirable for the position:

- Experience using TCP/IP communication
- Experience in SQL dataa Microsoft SQL Server
- Commercial experience using web technologies C# ASP.NET (MVC), CSS, LESS / SASS, Javascript/Jquery
- Experience in WordPress Theme & Plug-in development
- Experience in Node.js and Electron
- Experience using distributed source control (E.g. Git, Mercurial, etc.)
- Experience using a code management workflow (E.g. Git-flow)

jobs.title: Software Development Internship
jobs.description:
Spookfish Innovations, a vision company based out of Bangalore and London. The company has experienced exceptional growth over the past 3 years and are looking to consolidate and add to their core libraries by going beyond the state of the art.

Website: www.spookfish.in

Job type:Internship- C++

Desired Experience: Fresher

Salary: Stipend upto 15000/month 

Skills required:

-Strong C++ skills (Hint: Apply if you have heard of C++ 11 and used it in your code)
-Experience using a distributed version control system (E.g. Git, Mercurial, etc.)
-Experience in Image Processing and Multiple View Geometry (This is not mandatory)
-Proficient/Fluent English speaker

jobs.title: Commissioning Engineer
jobs.description:
Commissioning Engineer to join the project execution team at Spookfish Innovations, a vision company based out of Bangalore and London. The company has experienced exceptional growth over the past 2 years and are looking to consolidate their role in the Manufacturing and Sports industries in India, the UK and beyond.

The commissioning engineer will be expected to play a role in the conceptualization, design, prototyping, installation, quality testing, commissioning and support for Spookfish's products and solutions, in conjunction with the core development and management teams.

Qualification:BE/Diploma in electrical engineering

Key attributes:

• Ability to deliver innovative technology in line with business requirements 
  in an agile working environment
• Excellent creative talent and attention to detail
• Ability to own a project and work independently
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills
• Ability to deliver tasks and/or projects within given deadlines and to a high 
  quality
• Keen Interest in new ideas and technologies
• Ability to prioritize tasks under pressure
• Ability to work as part of a motivated and driven team
• Willingness to travel regularly and spend 50% of working days at the client 
  locations

Skills required for the position: 

1.Basic knowledge of computer and server operation

2.Basic knowledge of electronics and electrical systems

3.Strong communication skills, both oral and written

4.Proficient English speaker

Skills desirable for the position:

1.Background in engineering/technology

2.Understanding of circuit design

3.PLC programming

4.Understanding of computer vision and industrial automation

5.Understanding of photography and optics

Job Location: Bengaluru,Karnataka and  Baroada,Gujrat

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description:
Spookfish Innovations is an established machine vision company based out of Bristol, UK and Bangalore, India is looking for a Project Manager to join our young team. The company has experienced exceptional growth over the past 3 years and are looking to consolidate their role in the Manufacturing and Sports industries in India, the UK and beyond.

The primary task of the technical project manager is to be responsible for leading a project from its inception to execution. This includes planning, execution and managing the people, resources 3rd parties and scope of the project. They must be able to manage the client and to create clear and attainable objectives and to see them through to successful completion. 

Additionally, the candidate will be expected to play an important role in liasoning our marketing and sales activities and get to ideate and collaborate with the technical team across our UK and India offices. During this role, you will be engaging with high level connections in the industry and having a keen sense of solving problems along with the relentless attitude will be an essential requirement.

Experience required: 1-2 years

Key attributes:
Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the flawless execution of projects
Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time, within scope and within budget
Manage the relationship with the client and all relevant stakeholders
Regularly report to the management and escalate as needed
Identify and mitigate risks in project delivery 
Ability to write technical proposals and build quotations
Excellent creative talent and attention to detail
Ability to own leads and work independently 
Understand and analyse customers technical requests
Ability to prioritise tasks under pressure
Ability to work as part of a motivated and driven team
Willingness to travel regularly and spend 30% - 50% of working days across various locations


Skills required for the position: 
Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multitasking skills
Deep knowledge in automation products 
Proficient English speaker

Skills desirable for the position:
Prior project management experience 
Good understanding of pharmaceutical packaging processes
Understanding of computer vision and industrial automation
Understanding of photography and optics
